body: @roji @AndriySvyryd If you have a channel I can use, I can gladly send you my code base "as-is" to facilitate replicating the issue.
@jscarle as always, ideally you'd simply post a minimal, runnable repro here. We generally don't have the resources to accept full projects as-is and work out how they function etc.

@roji I'm just not sure how I could effectively create a minimal repro with this specific issue. I suppose I could create a new project that tries to replicate the minimum setup for that particular value object. I'll give it a try by duplicating my current codebase, deleting as much as I can from it and try to isolate the code that may recreate this bug.
@jscarle Thanks! That pinpointed the bug in the snapshot generator related to handling complex properties of value type.
